author: John Hays
content:
DB Entertainment pulled it off again 

DB Entertainment pulled it off again . Reliable, trustworthy and on time . Simply the best  company by far. Well organised and efficient , the team that worked on the rides and bouncy castle worked well . No trouble, very smart and quick to help if it was required . We have used DB Entertainment for over 9 yrs . We had over 800 kids to  entertain , The team pulled out all the stopsğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘
